title: Windows 8.1 KMS Activator Ultimate v1.4.1
description:
Description:

Windows 8.1 KMS Activator Ultimate is the most Simple & user-Friendly activator for Windows 8.1 
It is Safe activator, with no harm to System Files. Period of activation is 180 days and you can renew it after it expires. You can remove any previous activations
You can know informations about your activation and your window's current serial and the remaining days of activation.


It can Activates:

*Windows 8.1 Pro
*Windows 8.1 Enterprise
*Windows Server 2012 R2 Server Standard
*Windows Server 2012 R2 Datacenter
*Windows Server 2012 R2 Essentials
*Windows 8 Professional
*Windows 8 Professional N
*Windows 8 Enterprise
*Windows 8 Enterprise N


What's New in Version 1.4.1 :

*New Design
*Stable Version
*Update KMS server every day
*Add Activation of:
-Windows 8 Professional
-Windows 8 Professional N
-Windows 8 Enterprise
-Windows 8 Enterprise N
*Fixed all bugs


Requirements:

*Net Framework 2.0
*Internet Connection


Instructions:

1] Run the application As Administrator
2] Click Uninstall Product Key
3] Click "Update Server" to Update KMS Server
4] Click on which version of Windows you want to activate
5] Done, Enjoy :)
